name: Hamatula Grasp
description: You deal terrible damage to impaled foes.
prerequisites: Hamatula Strike, Improved Grapple, Strength 13, base attack bonus +9
benefit: When attacking an impaled opponent (see Hamatula Strike) with the weapon that impales them, you only suffer a â€“2 penalty to your grapple check. If the check succeeds, you deal an extra 1d6 damage.
